item.description:
On Sunday, Mar 29 at 2PM we will have an "Intermediate and up" level meetup at the Cambridge Rindge and Latin High School (CRLS) in Cambridge.

Intermediate - Players with firm understanding of game strategy. Should have a good grasp of skills (passing, setting, hitting). For indoor games, 5-1 / 6-2 formation experience highly recommended.

The entrance to the gym is on Cambridge Street opposite the Skendarian Apothecary. The nearest intersection to the entrance is Cambridge Street and Roberts Road.

Please RSVP if you plan on attending. RSVP's will close on Sunday 3/29 at 10 AM.

The cost of the meetup will be between $3 and $5, depending on the number of attendees. Please pay the organizer when you arrive before the meetup starts. The money goes to cover the cost of the court rental.

The nearest T stop is Harvard Square. The gym is about a ten minute walk from the T stop.

Parking near the school on Sundays is generally easy to find, as meters and residential parking rules are generally not enforced on Sundays (parking signs should say "EX SUNDAY" or similar).
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the Chinese guy wearing a pair of black framed sport goggles.
item.name: CRLS Intermediate+ Indoor Volleyball Sun 3/29 2PM
